title: We Recap Our First Bert Show TV Experience
description:
We’re launching “Bert Show TV,” a new interactive way to experience The Bert Show! Yesterday, we did our first studio version and it went well. However, there was a very competitive game of Jenga going on. So who won? We debate. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
